text: Corn masa tamales filled with green chili sauce and cheese, steamed in corn husks. A traditional dish enjoyed throughout Toluca.
A refreshing lemon-flavored sorbet, a traditional dessert from Toluca often enjoyed in the main squares and markets of the city.
Spicy and savory pork chorizo, seasoned with regional spices. Perfect for tacos, tortas, or breakfast dishes, representing Toluca’s culinary tradition.
